item.title: Project 1 : Building ML models to detect paddy diseases
item.description: (These pages are under development) Background Population Grows but Production Fell One of the Main Causes Our main objective is to minimize human error and detect the diseases as early as possible. By detecting the diseases early, farmer could trim and sterilize the infected parts to stop and avoid the spread of the diseases infection which could lead into harvest failure. Final Model To detect rice diseases, we use a CNN model.
